title: The Rocker
description: The moment I saw her, I knew she’d be mine.The only problem is she’s my band’s manager, and if we get caught, she loses her job.I only wanted one night with her. One night to fuck her out of my system and be done with her.The only problem is after one taste of Pen, I’m addicted. I can’t get enough of her, and she’s pushing me away.She says what we had is a lapse in judgement, but I have to disagree. It’s the most sane thing I’ve ever done, and I’ll do anything to get her back underneath me, beside me, and to make her mine even if that means ruining what I’ve worked so hard to build up.The Rocker is the fifth standalone book in the Love is Blind series. If you like, strong heroines, sexy as sin alpha males, and steamy romance, then you’ll love Harlow Layne’s reverse age gap series.Buy The Rocker today to immerse yourself into the intriguing world of my love knows no bounds today!
author: Harlow Layne
